017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.number;
022
023import org.apiguardian.api.API;
024import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGUserUnitValue;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGPathElement;
027
028/**
029 *  The definition of the SVG {@code <path>} element.
030 *
031 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
032 *  @version $Id: SVGPath.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
033 *  @since 0.0.5
034 *
035 *  @UMLGraph.link
036 */
037@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGPath.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
038@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
039public sealed interface SVGPath extends SVGElementWithChildren, AllowsConditionalProcessingAttributes, AllowsGlobalEventAttributes, AllowsGraphicalEventAttributes, AllowsPresentationAttributes, AllowsStyleAttributes permits SVGElementAdapter, org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.internal.SVGPathImpl
040{
041        /*-----------*\
042    ====** Constants **========================================================
043        \*-----------*/
044    /**
045     *  An empty array of {@code SVGPath} objects.
046     */
047    public static final SVGPath [] EMPTY_SVGPath_ARRAY = new SVGPath [0];
048
049        /*---------*\
050    ====** Methods **==========================================================
051        \*---------*/
052    /**
053     *  Sets the path definition for this SVG {@code <path>} element.
054     *
055     *  @param  pathElements    The elements of the path.
056     */
057    public void setPathDefinition( final SVGPathElement... pathElements );
058
059    /**
060     *  Sets the length of the path represented by this SVG {@code <path>}
061     *  element.
062     *
063     *  @param  length  The author's computation of the total length of the
064     *      path, in user units. This type is used to calibrate the user
065     *      agent's own distance-along-a-path calculations with that of the
066     *      author. The user agent will scale all distance-along-a-path
067     *      computations by the ratio of this type to the user agent's own
068     *      computed type for total path length.<br>
069     *      <br>A type of zero is valid, but a negative type is an error.
070     *
071     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The type is less than 0.
072     */
073    public void setPathLength( final SVGUserUnitValue length );
074
075    /**
076     *  Sets the length of the path represented by this SVG {@code <path>}
077     *  element.
078     *
079     *  @param  length  The author's computation of the total length of the
080     *      path, in user units. This type is used to calibrate the user
081     *      agent's own distance-along-a-path calculations with that of the
082     *      author. The user agent will scale all distance-along-a-path
083     *      computations by the ratio of this type to the user agent's own
084     *      computed type for total path length.<br>
085     *      <br>A type of zero is valid, but a negative type is an error.
086     *
087     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The type is less than 0.
088     */
089    public default void setPathLength( final double length ) { setPathLength( number( length ) ); }
090
091    /**
092     *  Sets the length of the path represented by this SVG {@code <path>}
093     *  element.
094     *
095     *  @param  length  The author's computation of the total length of the
096     *      path, in user units. This type is used to calibrate the user
097     *      agent's own distance-along-a-path calculations with that of the
098     *      author. The user agent will scale all distance-along-a-path
099     *      computations by the ratio of this type to the user agent's own
100     *      computed type for total path length.<br>
101     *      <br>A type of zero is valid, but a negative type is an error.
102     *
103     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The type is less than 0.
104     */
105    public default void setPathLength( final long length ) { setPathLength( number( length ) ); }
106}
107//  interface SVGPath
108
109/*
110 *  End of File
111 */
